PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Heal equal to your Begrudged at the end of combat. Other healing sources will prioritize reducing Begrudged stacks instead of healing you directly.
Orb: Ignores #yFocus. Deals #b1 damage to the enemy with the most HP. When #yEvoked, #yChannel #b1 #yBrick.
In this #yStance, you deal half attack damage. When entering this #yStance from #yCalm, don't gain Energy.
Move a card out of your #yExhaust pile.
